title: Goodbye To Tal's Hill, A Beloved — And Hated — Houston Ballpark Landmark
teaser: The 90-foot wide, flagpole-topped incline in Minute Maid Park's center field will be removed at the end of this year's baseball season. Tal's Hill is named for the Houston Astros' former president, Tal Smith.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
